reviews.review_msg: Very kind and knowledgeable. Creates an excellent classroom environment for true learning and growth. Highly recommend!

Went from absolute beginner to a proficient user of GIS in 12 weeks, and this helped me land a co-op purely because I was the only applicant who could use GIS! Meghan is incredibly understanding, very kind, and will accommodate as needed. She does have high expectations, but show up, work hard and you will do well. Highly recommend :)
love her. favorite prof of the yearp

Dr. Winters is the most dedicated professor who truly wants her students to do well. She has high expectations but you get what you put in. Great in 330 and 472. Course work was the most relevant to real world work I have done in university. One of the top professors in FHS
